system.requirements:
.Servitor Comrade: Clipaeus-Class Combat Servitor
Apt: Weapon Skill, Defence
system.descriptionText: Until the Beginning of the Character's Next Turn, Servitor Comrade in Cohesion will move to and attack the first enemy that approaches wihtin 5 metres of the Character, making a +0 Weapon Skill Test. If succeeding it hits once with its melee weapon. If the enemy was making a charge action against the character, it must resolve its attack against the Servitor Comrade instead.
